bour.camus.gameofgooses.models

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • bour.camus.gameofgooses.models.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    The Game class represents a game of the goose.
    Author:
    Armand BOUR, Tristan CAMUS

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Board mBoard
      Reference to the Board containing the cells.
      private IGameWatcher mInterface
      Reference to a class implementing IGameWatcher used to send information to the user interface.
      private int mNextPlayerIndex
      The index of the next player to play.
      private Player[] mPlayers
      Array containing all the players.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game(IGameWatcher ui)
        Constructor initialising the players through the IGameWatcher.initialisePlayers() method. Uses the default board.
        Parameters:
        ui - The class implementing IGameWatcher.

      • Game

        public Game(IGameWatcher ui,
    java.lang.String boardModel)
        Constructor initialising the players through the IGameWatcher.initialisePlayers() method. Uses the specified file as a model for the Board.
        Parameters:
        ui - The class implementing IGameWatcher.
        boardModel - The name of the file to use as a model for the board.

      • Game

        public Game(java.lang.String boardModel,
    java.lang.String... names)
        Constructor initialising the players in mPlayers using the specified values.
        Parameters:
        boardModel - The name of the file to use as a model for the board.
        names - The list of names (between 2 and 6).

    • Method Detail

      • swapPlayers

        private void swapPlayers(ICell cellFrom,
               ICell cellTo)
        Exchange positions of two players from 2 cells
        Parameters:
        cellFrom - The cell on which is the first player.
        cellTo - The cell on which is the second player.

      • play

        public void play()
        Starts the loop of a game of the goose.

      • isFinished

        public boolean isFinished()
        Checks whether the current game is finished or not.
        Returns:
        true if the game is finished ; false else.

      • nextPlayer

        Gets the player whose turn is is.
        Returns:
        The player whose turn it is.

      • getNumberPlayers

        public int getNumberPlayers()
        Get the number of players in the game.
        Returns:
        The number of players currently playing.

      • getBoard

        public Board getBoard()
        Gets the Board used by the current Game.
        Returns:
